Submodules¶

lmdp.LMDPClass module¶

LMDP (Language for MDP) class. This class holds prior (deterministic) information:

  • Policy/Sub-policies

  • Rewards/Values

  • Dynamics

  • State Abstractions (symbols)

For Discrete MDPs

author: Rafael Rodriguez-Sanchez (rrs@brown.edu) date: v0 September 2020

v1 January 2021

class lmdp.LMDPClass.LMDP(mdp=None, factor_names=None, domain_name=None)¶

lmdp.experiment_runner module¶

lmdp.experiment_runner.experiment_params()¶
lmdp.experiment_runner.run_agents(agents, mdp, exp_params=None)¶
lmdp.experiment_runner.run_single_agent_on_mdp(agent, mdp, episodes, steps, experiment=None, verbose=False, track_disc_reward=False, reset_at_terminal=False, resample_at_terminal=False)¶
Summary:

Main loop of a single MDP experiment.

Returns

(bool:reached terminal, int: num steps taken, list: cumulative discounted reward per episode)

Return type

(tuple)
